title: could someone please tell me where to post
author: forazzurri2axz

posts.post_title: could someone please tell me where to post
posts.post_content: baseball display cases for sale--aluminum ones with red felt etc...thanks Bill Latzko    [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]

well, if you go by the description of each category i'd say "everything else" but many people post in other categories depending on what is being displayed. so if you are displaying T206s then it would appear it would be ok to post them in that category. i have seen many displays that way. worst case, someone tells you it's the wrong spot.

[quote name="forazzurri2axz" post=1624833]baseball display cases for sale--aluminum ones with red felt etc...thanks Bill Latzko    [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url][/QUOTE]

Ok, you found it wasn't the front page. Good guess. It is the last category (the bottom one) in the BST section and it says-

Everything Else, Football, Non-Sports etc.. B/S/T
 All posts in this section may include items such as... collectibles, Football, sports (other than baseball), non-sports, packs, anything else.
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/forumdisplay.php?f=18[/url]

Does that help? :)

.
